pages.title: Millstone
pages.text: The <item>Millstone/$ is a simple <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/rotary)rotary powered/$ grinder. It can double ores, produce gravel, and improve bonemeal yields, among other things.$(br2)The <item>millstone/$ connects to an axle/gear on the top, and works faster at higher <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/rotary)speeds/$- it consumes power at (2 * (speed in
rad/s)) J/t, requiring 400J total per crafting operation performed.$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)Reader circuits/$ measure the fullness of the input.$(br2)
For ore tripling, a heavier duty version called a <item>$(l:crossroads:rotary/stamp)stamp mill/$ is needed.$(br2)
